member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.Connection(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new SqlConnection.
member.param: The SqlConnectionStringBuilder containing the connection string.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.As``1(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Creates and returns a new DbConnection for the connection string and implments the given interface.
member.typeparam: The interface to implement on the connection.
member.param: The SqlConnectionStringBuilder containing the connection string.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.Open(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenAsync(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenAs``1(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Opens and returns a database connection implementing a given interface.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenAsAsync``1(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens and returns a database connection implementing a given interface.
member.param: The connection string to open and return.
The cancellation token to use for the operation.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenWithTransaction(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Opens a database connection and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.returns: A wrapper for the database connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAsync(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a database connection and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The cancellation token to use for the operation.
member.returns: A task returning a connection when the connection has been opened.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAs``1(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder)
member.summary: Opens a database connection implementing a given interface and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.returns: A wrapper for the database connection.

member.name: M:Insight.Database.SqlConnectionStringBuilderExtensions.OpenWithTransactionAsAsync``1(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnectionStringBuilder,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asynchronously opens a database connection implementing a given interface, and begins a new transaction that is disposed when the returned object is disposed.
member.param: The cancellation token to use for the operation.
member.returns: A task returning a connection when the connection has been opened.
